brief.brief: This form enables you to specify Boolean expressions to determine whether Option keys are available to the user.
For example, the expression could check the operator's capability words and verify their authority to use the key.
If the condition is true, Service Manager makes the corresponding Option key available.
Some fields control more than one Option key.
